Fab City Challenge

Fab City Global Initiative challenges the current industrial paradigm of Product-in Trash-out, by advocating for the return of manufacture to cities supported by a Data-in Data-out urban model. It comprises a network of 28 cities, a core team of collective members and is governed by a foundation, all working to change the urban paradigm of yesterday, and make the cities of tomorrow.

Our Approach

We apply our vision and values in a full stack model. From the local to the global, we work across multiple layers of practice and deployment, scaling the FabLab approach to a city and systems level.
